formElement.label: Working Directory
formElement.documentation: Indicate the directory where the jmx test file resides.

formElement.label: JMeter File
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the jmx test file to execute.(This is the command-line '-t ' option)

formElement.label: Server
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the remote server where the jmx file resides.(This is the command-line '-l ' option)

formElement.label: Log File
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the file for the test results.(This is the command-line '-R' option)

formElement.label: Additional Options
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional options to add to the jmeter command.
